short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scroll automagically to end of buildbot logs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Buildbot, the logfiles, especially the ones where more content appears as build progresses. Know what I'm talking about? Wouldn't it be nice if they scrolled automatically as they grow? Like a terminal?

Install this extension and suddenly there are keyboard shortcuts available on buildbot logfiles. The keys to press are inspired by "less".
